arts.ttl: Lazio Crash Out of Europa League as Historic Comeback Undone by Dramatic Shootouts
arts.sum: Lazio hosted Bodo/Glimt in the second leg of the Europa League quarter-final, and it turned out to be one for the ages. The Biancocelesti started the night trailing 0-2 on aggregate, but managed to turn the result upside down, only to concede an equalizer and crash out on penalties. Lazio Starting Lineup Taty Castellanos spearheaded […] The post Lazio Crash Out of Europa League as Historic Comeback Undone by Dramatic Shootouts appeared first on The Laziali.
